nodes.commentor: Aeolus and Shawn are in love

nodes.text: So how are things with you today?
Things are definitely looking up.
I wrote a new song today.

Every night in my room,
You come here, I see you
And give me a reason to sing.

Even though you're tone deaf
And can't tell a treble clef
I know this is more than a fling

Here, there, wherever you go
I know that my love will still grow,
With you near to stand by my side
I will face life with pride
And My heart is turned on by Shawn
What do you think?
I think it's the sweetest thing anyone's ever sung about me.
It's a nice melody.
That's a bass calumny - I know treble when I see it. I read the clef notes.
So you think I done you song?
I'd call you a lyre, but I'm just stringing you along. You've already got the key to my harp.
Then I chant recant - this is a cymbal of waltz on my mind.
Then let's duet!
<grin>
That doesn't float my boat.
You're a lifesaver to me, so I thought I'd throw you a line.
You must be a Rogue - because you've stolen my heart.
I should have stolen a kiss at the same time.
Sweet dreams are made of thee..
Who am I to disagree?
Are you still hung up on Esme?
<shrug>
Don't worry - you'll get over this. Someone else will come along who will make your heart sing.
<shrug>

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Get Over It

nodes.text: Look - stop moping and get on with your life. So Esme doesn't love you, so what? She's not the only woman in the world.
<shrug>

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Clean Up the Room

nodes.text: The mess in this room would depress anyone. You should get up and clean up around here.
<shrug>
Get some sleep, why don't you?
<shrug>

options.text: Ask Aeolus Politely to Stop Playing

nodes.text: You'll feel a lot better if you stop playing sad songs and try to get some rest instead.
<shrug>
Stop playing that flute so that I can get some peace around here.
You sound cheery.
I've got a song in my heart - Want to hear it?
Sure, go ahead.

Esme
I do beseech ya
I'd love to meet ya.

You're my main feature.
You should know that
I only want to chat
And not just fall flat
Or be a placemat,

I love you Esme.
I'll tell you no lies
I cannot disguise
I like your bright eyes.

Whenever you dance,
If there's an off-chance
You'd like some romance
I won't look askance.
Please love me Esme!
How was that? Is it worthy of Esme?
I think Esme will be flattered by your song.
<grin>

I don't know if Esme will think it charming,
Disarming, or simply alarming.
Sorry, I don't have time for your silly songs right now.
Are you still trying to steal Esme from me?
No - I can't steal what you haven't got. You didn't have her in the first place.
Are you going out with Esme?
More like I'm staying in with Esme... she's teaching me the songs of her people.
So you are making beautiful music together then?
I'd be a lyre if I said I wasn't suite on Esme.
You should rest up for tomorrow.

I could play all night from my delight,
But I will rest at your request.
